mapper.insert: INSERT INTO spring_products (product_no, category_id, product_name, product_price, product_discount_price) VALUES (spring_product_seq.NEXTVAL, #{category.id}, #{name}, #{price}, #{discountPrice})
mapper.select: SELECT product_no AS no, category_id AS "category.id", product_name AS name, product_price AS price, product_discount_price AS discountPrice, product_stock AS stock, product_created_date AS createdDate FROM spring_products ORDER BY product_no ASC

SELECT product_no AS no, category_id AS "category.id", product_name AS name, product_price AS price, product_discount_price AS discountPrice, product_stock AS stock, product_created_date AS createdDate FROM spring_products WHERE category_id = #{value} ORDER BY product_no ASC

SELECT product_no AS no, category_id AS "category.id", product_name AS name, product_price AS price, product_discount_price AS discountPrice, product_stock AS stock, product_created_date AS createdDate FROM spring_products WHERE product_no = #{value}
mapper.update: UPDATE spring_products SET product_price = #{price}, product_discount_price = #{discountPrice}, product_stock = #{stock} WHERE product_no = #{no}
